author: Max

text: @floriasn Really? I think a bear that can wear a tutu is much more ridiculous than yodeling. =P Humorous stuff like this is always included in games. Even "serious" games like Silent Hill 3 let you dress up as a Sailor Moon character and shoot beams out of your eyes to kill enemies as a bonus. It's best to enjoy these things rather than feel embarrassed with them.

author: ShakinJamacian

text: A friend of mine who was a big fan of Smash Brothers and always played it decided to rent this game when it came out. He told his girlfriend this was a real serious fighter, popped the game in, chose a random map and landed on this one (Hidden Retreat). They both couldn't believe what was going on... basically imagine a stage with tons of sheep around you and in your way, getting knocked all over the place by your hits while you're fighting, with this music playing. Now that's a serious game. :P
author: SupraDarky
